iati-activity.title: INNOVATION SYSTEMS - COFISA
iati-activity.description: THE PROGRAMME AIMS TO ENSURE THAT IN THE PARTICIPATING PROVINCES THE CAPACITY, STRUCTURES, LEGISTLATION, GUIDELINES AND THE WILL FOR THE COOPERATION CONDUCIVE TO SOCIAL AND ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT BETWEEN PUBLIC AND PRIVATE SECTOR AS WELL AS SCIENCE AND RESE

iati-activity.title: INFORMATION SOCIETY STRATEGIES - INSPIRE

iati-activity.title: MERAKA PROGRAMME IN SOUTH AFRICA

iati-activity.title: Establishing a national Computer Security Incident Responce Team in South Africa
iati-activity.description: CSIR (Council of Scientific Research) and FICORA (Finnish Communications Regulatory Authority) are starting up an ICI-project with the aim of establishing a national Computer Security Incident Responce Team (CSIRT)in South Africa. The sub-objectives include building the capacity of CSIR to run a CSIRT, creating strong domestic and international relations in CSIR regarding CSIRT activities and to develop the capacity of CSIR's CSIRT personnel.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in South Africa
iati-activity.description: This Programme will be implemented in Botswana, Lesotho and South Africa, the overarching goal of the project is to help enhance the leadership and Organisational Skills among Political Parties through training so that they can conduct themselves and their affairs more effectively . The project will consists of seven thematic areas.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in South Africa
iati-activity.description: The NWGA is a producer organisation and was established in 1929, the proved training in wool sheep production to farmers and farm workers in the commerical and emerging farming sector.Ths training will focus on five areas of intervention to increase the profitability of communal wool farming.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in South Africa
iati-activity.description: TLAC was estabilshed in 1996, to undertake Legal advocacy to eradicate the victimisation of women by the law and the legal system , and to make the legal system a vehicle for Social change for women. Training on the sexual offences Act will be conducted for community based organisations and police officers in the rural areas of Mpumalanga, and Advocacy campaigns will be organised with different partners.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in South Africa
iati-activity.description: Strengthening local entrepreneurship in crafts industry, that has social impact. Target doubling turnouver of 11 participating companies, creating new jobs, and training new emerging entrepreneurs. Increasing trade and design cooperation between Finland and South Africa.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in South Africa
iati-activity.description: To build Capacity and Promote awareness of the links between rights and Gender Justice Through constructive conflict Management and resolution.This programme aims to strenghten the capacity of African Human rights Institutions.CCR will conduct a series of Training interventions, which will focus on the 3 following themes, Conflict Early Warning and response,Gender and Peacebuilding and Human Rights and Conflict Management.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in South Africa
iati-activity.description: Science education support for students and teachers in three school districts in Eastern cape. The purpose of the project is to provide learners opportunity outside school activities to learn about science through science festivals and science clubs.

iati-activity.description: The project will support and train women entreprneurs to be able to enter in new technology businesses.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in South Africa
iati-activity.description: Training and other support to strenghten small scale farmers in the Western, Northern and Eastern Cape. Advocacy for more appropriate support programmes from government. Advocacy for a legal and policy environment that is supportive of small scale farmers.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in South Africa
iati-activity.description: University driven project, that designs and tests models for development the poor communities. The objective is to combine increasing well-being and livelihoods of the poor whilst tending to environmental needs.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in South Africa
iati-activity.description: The goal of the project is to contribute to the eradication of Gender based violence in SA, by deeping our understanding of the intersection between culture and gender based violence, in order to develop policy and Advocacy strategies that speak to addressing the intersection in a sustainable and coordinated manner
